column1: good length outside off, shahzad gives it a full swing but doesn't connect well and it rolls to mid-on
back of length on leg, pulls it and gets it fine and past short fine leg for a boundary
good length outside off, moves back and cuts it but finds the point fielder on the bounce
down the leg and wide given for it
back of length outside off, moves back and punches it between point and cover for a couple as thirdman runs across to field it
back of length again, moves back and flicks it but to short square leg fielder
slower ball full outside off, doesn't read it well enough to connect from the middle of the bat but gets a run at mid-on
good length just outside off, pushes it of the backfoot to cover fielder
back of length outside off, shahzad feels its in his arc and goes after it with a big swing but doesn't connect and gets beaten
slower ball outside off, shahzad once again swing hard at it and gets a top egde over the slip fielder for a boundary
good length coming back into him, makes room to push it to on-side but gets too close to it and just manages to play it to mid-on
outside off, flashes hard at it but misses it once again
back of length, pulls it firmly along the ground to mid-wicket
slower full toss, flicks it to short mid-wicket fielder no run there
short ball, moves across making room but followed by Jarvis, forcing him to play a awkward shot
slower ball on the pads, nudges it to short fine leg but no run there
short ball, almost knocks him out and rolls on the floor after letting it go, wide called for over the head
onto the backfoot and nudges it to on-side but finds short square leg
short outside off, scoops it the last moment and away from thirdman, on the bounce and over the ropes
slower ball, nudges it of his pads away to on-side for a quick run
back of length outside off, onto the toes for a pull but doesn't connect well and it rolls to short mid-wicket
short ball and a well directed aswell, gets him to duck down and through to the keeper
back of length, onto the backfoot and pushes it to mid-on but no run there
fuller outside off, moves across and swings at it but gets a top edge in the air and taken by jarvis at mid-on, runnig backwards
back of length outside off, pushes it gently towards point for a quick run and the non-striker makes it in time
short ball but goes well over his head and no-ball called
free-hit, full outside off, goes deep in his crease and smacks it straight over the bowler's head for a six
short outside off, stands his ground and pokes his bat at it and gets it good and well away from thirdman for a boundary
short ball, comes to it with a full swing but misses it and gets hit on the helmet
slower ball outside off, pushed to point with soft hands, looking for a run but not there
fuller outside off, swing at it aiming for the buildings next to the stadium but gets a inside edge onto the pads
fuller on leg, moves across to flicks it to on-side but misses it and gets struck on the pads, loud appeal but not-out is the call
slower ball on middle stump, moves across to nudge it on-side but finds the short mid-wicket fielder
good length on middle, pushes it to the right of mid-on for a quick run
good length outside off, gives it a full swing but doesn't connect well enough to reach the boundary and gets a couple
good length on off, swings hard at it and connect perfectly this time, gets it over mid-wicket and out of the ground for a six
good length on leg, following him as he moved away early but karim manages well to get it away to thirdman with a cut shot
back of length, picks it up from outside off and drags it to mid-wicket for a boundary, just beating the fielder
short ball, ducks down to let it through to the keeper
tossed up, nudges it to away to on-side for a run
tossed up but down the leg and beats the keeper for a extra run
quicker ball, pushes it back to the bowler
tossed up, onto the frontfoot and does a defense
comes down the pitch and sikander saw it and pushed it down the leg and karim manages it hit it away to square leg for a run
flighted outside off, gets under it and lofts it over covers for a couple
flighted up again and slogs it over mid-wicket this time for a six
looped up, onto the backfoot and cuts it to point
looped up, moves back and drags it towards mid-wicket but finds the short mid-wicket fielder
down the pitch and drives it to long-on for a run
looped up, comes down and hits it hard and down to long-off for just a run
looped up outside off, comes down and hit it firmly along the ground to long-off, who does so well moving to his right and keeps it down to a run only
flighted up, drives it back to the bowler
tossed up on leg, gives it a swing going down on the knee but misses it and so does the keeper and it rolls away for a boundary of wide
tossed up, drives it straight back to sikandar
tossed up and sweeps it on the full to square leg for a run
flighted outside off, slogs it over long-off for a big six
tossed up outside leg, goes down to sweep it but misses it and a hearted appeal but not-out is the call
tossed up onto the frontfoot and driven down to long-on for a run
flighted outside off, drives it to sweeper cover for a run
flighted outside off, goes towards covers with the spin and gets it away to sweeper cover for a run
quicker ball on leg, pitched and went straight as he tried to nudge it but missed it
flighted up, comes down to slog it hard  but missed it and it hits the top of middle stump
slow looped delivery, onto the frontfoot to defend and gets it away to on-side of the inside half of the bat for a run
flighted up, onto the frontfoot and does a defense
quick and flat on middle, hits it straight back and fielded well of his own bowling
flighted outside off, drives it nicely to sweeper cover for a run
flighted up, comes down to greet it on the full and hits it along the ground to mid-wicket for a boundary
looped outside off, cuts it late to short thirdman for a quick run
looepd on leg, nudges it away to on-side for a quick run
flighted outside off, pushes it to covers for a run
outside off, drives it ton the rise to sweeper cover for a run
fuller on leg, nudges it to short fine leg for a quick run
looped outside off, tries to play a inside out drive but doesn't connect well enough and rolls to the cover fielder
onto the frontfoot and drives it down to long-on for a run
drags it short, goes back and punches it down to long-on for a run
looped up, comes down to meet it on the full and gets beaten, easy stuff for the keeper
flighted up, onto the frontfoot and does a solid defense
quick ball, goes through with the arm but down the leg and wide given
flighted up, pushed to covers of the backfoot but finds the fielder
flighted up, sees it in his arc and slogs it straight back for a huge six
flighted outside off, pushes it to covers for a run
flighted on off, punches it down to long-off for a run
flighted outside off, moves away and cuts it nicely past short thirdman for a couple
onto the backfoot and pushed to sweeper cover for a run to reach the team 100
drags it short outside off, onto the backfoot and punches it into the covers for a boundary, no chance for the long-off fielder to comes across for that
onto the backfoot and nudges it away to on-side for a run
looped on leg, flicks it to short fine leg for a run
flighted on leg, slogs it over mid-wicket for a big six. out of the park
onto the frontfoot and drives it back to the bowler
wrong'un but reads it well and blocks it
back of length, nudges it away to on-side for a run as the bowler runs across himself and fields it
slower ball on leg, gives it a swing but misses it
slower ball again, manages it nicely away to on-side for a run
short outside off, lets it through to the keeper
slower ball, hits it straight back over the bowler and beats the long-on fielder for a boundary
fuller on leg, flicks it onto his pads and away to on-side for a run
back of length outside off, lofts it over mid-off for a couple
slower outside off, cuts it late but to the point fielder
back of length, goes deep and swings towards mid=wicket but misses it
fuller outside off, as he moves away to make room and beaten to it
short ball, pulls it firmly away to mid-wicket and it spins away from the fielder as he ran in to field it
good length outside off, cuts it over point for a boundary
slwoer ball, pushes it to covers and fielder there
wide outside off, tries to cut it but missed it and wide given
slower outside off, flashes hard at it but gets a inside edge away from the stumps for a quick run
short ball and directed well into his body, najibullah went flat down on the ground to survive that
good length outside off, smacks it flat and away from long-off for a boundary
slower ball on middle, hits it hard towards mid-wicket but fielder getting under it but drops it and they get across for a couple
short ball, a typical fast bowler's reply but gets it just over the head and wide given
full on off, hits it back to the bowler
back of length on the pads, tries to get it over short fine leg but gets it of his pads away to on-side for a leg-bye run
back of length, swings it towards mid-wicket but gets more height than distance and taken by burl easily
on the pads, flicks it away to on-side and awya from fine leg for a boundary
good length on middle, slogs it over mid-wicket for a huge six
good length outside off, hits it on the backfoot and over long-off for another six
short ball and lets it through to the keeper
full toss, hits it straight to long-on for a good catch taken by sikander
slower ball wide outside off, goes after it with a flat hit towards deep cover and taken by waller, good running catch by waller
full outside off, goes for a drive but gets a outside edge safely down to thirdman for a run
slower outside off, pushes it to covers with soft hands for a quick run
slow yorker, jams it into the ground to get it away to on-side but no run there as the bowler did well to field it
good length on middle, drags it away to mid-wicket and taken by ryan burl just inside the boundary, superb catch jumping up in the air and made sure his never went over the ropes
back of the hand slower ball, rashid went down onto the knees to slog it but missed it and it goes over the stumps
back of length ball, following him as he moved away to cut it but missed it
slower ball again down the leg this time, lofts it towards fine leg and taken with ease by Muzarbabani at the ropes
short ball, gets really high on him but get throws his bat at it and just hits it high in the air, keeper calls for it and dives forward to take it
hat-trick ball, fuller on middle and defended well
slower ball outside off, gives it a full swing but gets a outside edge down to thirdman for a run
onto the backfoot and pushed to covers for a run
tossed up, looks to drive it into covers but misses it
tossed up, pushed to covers of the backfoot
tossed up, onto the frontfoot to defend but gets beaten and just misses the off-stump
quicker on leg, tries the reverse sweep but misses it
full on middle, drives it straight towards mid-on and to the fielder
good length on off, looks to drives it as it rises up but beaten
good length on middle, moves into him and beats the bat to hit him at the protected area
fuller outside off, guides it down to thirdman for a run
back of length, punches it of the backfoot to cover fielder
back of length again, makes room to hit it over covers but gets a outside edge and just past the diving shahzad
back of length, pushes it to mid-on but no run there
tossed up, tries to hit it toward mid-wicket but missed it comepletely and it knocks the off-stump
tossed up, pushes it of the backfoot to point fielder
on the pads, nudges it to short fine leg but no run there
tossed up, looks to defend it but gets a outside edge to short thirdman
tossed on leg, flicks it away to square leg for a run
flighted up, punches it straight past the bowler for a run
back of length outside off, slaps it straight back but to the mid-off fielder
onto the backfoot and punches it back to the bowler, who fields well and throws it back at the stumps and it bounces over the keeper for a boundary
full on leg, flicks it away to mid-on but no run there
good length outside off, moves away to hit it over covers but misses it
onto the backfoot and pushed to cover fielder
onto the frontfoot and drives it away to on-side for a run
tossed up, onto the frontfoot and pushes it back to the bowler
tossed outside off, cuts it firmly but finds the point fielder
tossed up, comes down the pitch and slogs it over covers for a six
tossed up again and comes down to the pitch of it again and hits it much straight this time for another six
tossed up, onto the frontfoot and does a defense
flighted up, nudges it away to on-side for a run
full outside off, onto the frontfoot and drives it to cover fielder
good length outside off, comes down to hit it over covers but misses it
good length outside off, comes down with a big heave and misses it
slower ball down the leg, tries to swing at it but misses it and so does the keeper and they get across for a couple extra runs
slower ball outside off, gets close to it and cuts it past point for a couple as thirdman puts in a superb effort to stop it from crossing the ropes
full outside off, drives it on the rise to cover fielder
full outside off, takes a step down and drives it firmly past the bowler and beats the mid-off fielder aswell to run away for a boundary
tossed up, drives it on the full just over covers for a boundary
slower through the air as he drops it short this time, onto the backfoot and punches it down to long-on for a run
tossed up, onto the forntfoot and driven to cover fielder
tossed up, goes for the reverse sweep but doesn't connect well
tossed on leg, moves away to flick it down to long-on but plays it straight to short mid-wicket fielder who takes a good catch diving infront of him
tossed on middle and goes straight with the arm, moves on the backfoot to nudge it to on-side but misses it and hit on the pads
slower ball, pushes it to on-side with soft hands for a quick run
full outside off, goes for a drive but gets a outside edge down to thirdman for a run
slower ball outside off, drives it firmly to sweeper cover for a run
back of length, drags it away to the right of long-on who gets a hand to it but couldn't hold onto it and it runs away for a boundary
slower ball on leg, tries to flick it but gets hit on the pads for a leg-bye run
full on off, drives it down to long-off for a run
full on leg, nudges it away to on-side for a run
flighted on leg, nudges it away to on-side for a run
tossed on leg, drives it away to sqaure leg for a run
flighted up, onto the backfoot and pushed it down to long-on for a run
quicker ball, pushes it away to square leg for a run
quick and flat into the pads, tries to flick it but gets hit on the pads
drags it short first up, punches it down to long-on for a run
flighted on leg, flicks it away to square leg for a run
tossed outside off, cuts it late towards short thirdman and it spins away from him, mis-field gets them a couple
tossed up, onto the backfoot and pushes it back to the bowler

tossed outside off, goes for a paddle shot but lofts it in the air towards short fine leg and takes it after a bit of fumble, third umpire called in to check on it with the soft signal being out, takes a couple of replays and declares it out
tossed outside off, goes for a drive but edges it past the keeper and gets a lucky boundary
tossed outside off, onto the backfoot and pushes it to cover fielder
quicker ball outside off, swings towards long-on but misses it
flighted up following the batsman as goes across the stumps and beats him with the low-trajectory
flighted outside off, tries to cut but beaten once more
flighted up, driven back to the bowler
tossed on leg, across the wickets and flicks it to on-side for a run
tossed outside off, goes for a reverse sweep and gets it perfectly in between short thirdman and point for a boundary
flighted outside off, tries to reverse sweep it again but gets it of his gloves away to short thirdman for a run
flighted outside off, cuts it late to short thirdman for a run
tossed up, gives it a full swing but gets a edge onto his pads and back to the bowler
tossed up, drives it away to long-on for a run
tossed outside off, makes room and slaps it away to sweeper cover for a run
quicker ball on off, tries to drag it away to mid-wicket but hits it on his pads, lucky it could have even gone onto the stumps
looped up, onto the frontfoot and pushes it to covers with soft hands for a run
googly, reads it nicely and pushes it away to point for a quick run
looped on off, nudges it towards point with soft hands for a quick run
looped up, tries to reverse sweep it but gets hit on the pads for nothing
flighted up, plays it away to short fine leg with the spin for a run only
slower outside off, hits it down to long-on for a run
full toss outside off, hits it sweetly over point to vacant deep point area for a boundary
slower ball, comes down to the pitch of it and slaps it straight for a six
slower ball again but gets it wrong as a full toss, drags it away to mid-wicket for a boundary
full on leg, moves away to flick it to on-side but misses the bat and hits him on the pads, they get across for a leg-bye run
good length ball, hits it straight back the bowler for a couple as its gathered by long-on
flighted up, lets it spin and cuts it away to short thirdman for a quick run
flighted up, reverse sweeps it firmly towards point, who dives to stop it but gets a hand to it to slow it down for a run only
googly outside off, spins back but watched carefully by sikandar to deal with it and pushes it to point for a quick run
flighted on leg, nudges it to short fine leg for a run
flighted up, onto the knees and sweeps it away to square leg for a run
flighted outside off, goes for a reverse sweep and connects well and gets it past short thirdman for a boundary
quick outside off, tries to drive it but gets a bottom edge through the keeper's legs for a boundary
dragged short, tries to pull it towards mid-wicket but gets a top edge to on-side, nabi runs across to catch it of his own bowling but doesn't get there
quick outside off, moves away to get it over covers but misses it
tossed up, plays it away to mid-wicket for a run
flighted up, flicks it away to on-side for a quick couple
tossed up, tries to get it over cover but misses it
looped up, flicks it away to on-side for a run
flighted up, tries to reverse sweep it but misses it and gets struck on the pads, loud appeal it made and given, sikandar is furious for some unkown reason
looped up on leg, tries to nudge it but gets it of his pads down to short fine leg for a leg-bye run
flighted up, goes hard at it towards long-on but gets more height than distance, fielder runs from long-on and puts in a dive but just doesn't get it there
onto the backfoot and pushes it to covers for a run
flighted outside off, reverse sweeps it nicely along the ground to sweeper cover for a run
short ball, pulls it away to mid-wicket for a couple
good length on middle, drags it away to the left of long-on for a couple
yorker, jams into the ground to get it out and survive
full toss, trying another yorker but gets it fuller and plays it down to long-on for a run
good length outside off, moves away to slap into covers but finds the fielder at the top of the circle but they get across for a run
fuller outside off, drives it into the ground to mid-off for a quick run
flighted up, drags it away to mid-wicket for a couple
flighted up, onto the frontfoot and slogs it hard towards mid-wicket but doesn't get the distance under it and taken by the fielder with ease
looped outside off, throws the bat at it and hits it straight to the captain asghar at covers and dropped, that just went in and came out of his hands like a jelly fish
looped up, drives it down to long-on for a run

flat and quick on leg, drags it away to square leg for a run, non-striker comes half way for the second but the striker gives no response, fielder returns with a wild throw over the keeper and striker makes back during the act
flighted up, looks to cut but gets beaten
good length outside off, moves away to hit it over cover but beaten as he got a bit too far from it
short ball, pulls it away the square leg umpire for a boundary
full on leg, gives it a swing but gets it of his pads away towards point for a leg-bye run
full outside off, drives it along the ground to sweeper cover for a run
full and straight, smacks it straight for a flat six
short ball, drags it away to mid-wicket for a run only and that's it. once again Afghanistan have won the game with ease and the series aswell
